text: Liam John Slade (born 14 May 1995) is an English footballer who plays for Stourbridge as a defender.1st Team - The Team‚ stourbridgefc.com ==Career== After coming through Burton Albion's youth system, Slade signed a professional contract in July 2013. In November 2013, Slade joined Redditch United on a one-month loan deal. Slade made his début for Burton Albion in a 3–1 away loss to Bury on 20 September 2014 in League Two. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |+ Club statistics |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|FA Cup !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="1"|Burton Albion |2014–15 ||League Two |2||0||0||0||1||0||0||0||3||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !2!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0!!0!!0!!3!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:English footballers Category:Burton Albion F.C. players Category:Redditch United F.C. players Category:A.F.C.
